explanation: Funds are required to support continued implementation and expansion of the Sexual Assault Special Victimsâ€™ Counsel Program in accordance with section 8057 of division C of Public Law 116-260, the DoD Appropriations Act, 2021, to provide legal assistance to eligible victims of an alleged sex-related offense and to enhance investigations and prosecutions of allegations of child abuse, serious domestic or sexual offenses and to provide support for such victims. This is a congressional special interest item. These are base budget requirements.
